title: Do Not Hide Your Face From Me, Lord

v1: Do not hide Your face from me, Lord.
Your radiant face, my only guide—
I can be bold and without fear;
Shine upon me with Your light.
v2: Lord, I know not where You hide.
I boldly press toward the goal,
Thus, Lord, may Your precious presence
v3: When I seek Your best, Lord Jesus,
When Your will is my intention,
That I can lose myself in You;
Thus, Lord, may Your glory always,
Draw me from the earth away.
v4: Lord, do grant me one intention:
Not to grieve Your heart again.
Lord, it is You I now beseech,
Embrace me tightly in Your breast;
May Your sweet and loving Person
Ever be my strength and rest.
